title: Once you have a certain amount of games in bronze 5
body: You should secretly be added into the intermediate bots queue, and so the bronzies didn't catch on, the bots would ban malphite, amumu, blitz, shen, katarina, and akali every game, they would also have names similar to XxYoloswagxX and #420blazeitswag.

replies.body:
Intermediate bots are a bit too difficult for Bronze 5s to beat.
Anyway though, I see a major flaw in your plan here. Any self-respecting Bronze 5 will flame the enemy and their own team in all chat, which intermediate bots do not do.

Intermediate bots are easy, i solo them as support, what are you guys talking about?

Also, if rito should ban names like that, its not even ......

We see enough internet as it is, there is not need for it in league.

this does happen, its why they say they are stuck in elo hell, because they cant win any games against those damn pro as heck int bots.

also, kartoffeln, its not hard to code comments for the bots to spam in all chat. hell, some of the stuff bots say at the end of games they win is pretty BM. but anyone above bronze 5 has never seen what the bots say when they win. super secret Illuminati %%%% right there kids.
